text: @kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden Damn, you forgot to use "Socialist" or you would have won the 'Dumbfuck Salaried Girlfriend Who Contracted Covid-19 But Still Thinks Her Opinion Is Remotely Credible' Sweepstakes.
